name: loaf cat
notes:
this is a super easy 1 hour project and it's customizable! 
and this pattern has been tested!!
this is a 2 in 1 pattern with two cats to make!

  these cats also make good buddies! 

materials

any yarn color you would like for your kitty.
black or pink for the mouth.
4.0mm hook. or 3.5mm hook.
safety eyes (size is your choice)
i like to use one color (any) to embroider around the eyes but its optional.
stuffing.
stitch marker.
scissors.
needle

abbreviations
mr – magic ring.
sc – single crochet.
inc – increase.
ch – chain.
rnd(s) – round(s).
5dc bobble – 5 double crochet bobble.
dec – decrease.

the cats you can make from this pattern are...
one color cat.  
siamese cat. 

have fun crocheting!
